attributes.action: Establish a system of Direct Democracy in the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: Direct Democracy is the only true democracy.  The chasm between public opinion and government policy is huge (and growing wider).  Putting a cross on a piece of paper once every five years is not democracy.
attributes.background: The current system of "representative" government is unfair and undemocratic.  The UK would benefit from a system of direct democracy, similar to the Swiss model, which would give citizens the opportunity to vote on issues which affect them.
